Core wars - your new favorite game

Last year while playing [r2con](http://rada.re/con) ctf, i saw some people playing an obscure assembly-like game I didn't understand at all. It actually wasn't assembly, it was Redcode, and the game was called Core War. »

Patching a binary using r2

When doing binary exploitation challenges, you can’t always just trick the program to make him do what you want it to do. Sometimes, it’s easier and faster to change it directly in order to get the result we expect.
